document_data.name: Talcum
document_data.mainbody: '''Talcum''' was a fine white powdered substance with several uses.
document_data.Usage:
*In the [[Blade Kingdoms]], talcum powder was used as a tool against thieves and spellcasters. The powder was used to dust floors in high-security locations, such as the [[Palace of Manniccis]] in the city-state of [[Sumbria]]. Talcum made it extremely challenging for sneak thieves and creatures under the effects of the ''[[invisibility]]'' spells to move undetected. The powder was often used alongside [[caltrop]]s and [[mine]]s.
